name: Mahasthangarh
description: Mahasthangarh is one of the earliest urban archaeological sites in Bangladesh, featuring ancient ruins and relics. It offers a fascinating journey into the country's historical past.

itinerary.day_1: Arrival at Mahasthangarh, guided tour of Govinda Bhita Temple and Mahasthangarh Museum, explore the archaeological site, departure.

name: Kuakata
description: Kuakata is known as the 'Daughter of the Sea' for its panoramic sea views and spectacular sunrises and sunsets. It is a serene destination for beach activities and relaxation.

itinerary.day_1: Arrival at Kuakata, check-in at hotel, visit the beach in the evening.
itinerary.day_2: Full-day tour to Gangamati Reserved Forest and local attractions.
itinerary.day_3: Morning leisure, check-out from hotel, departure.

name: Sonargaon
description: Sonargaon, the ancient capital of Bengal, is rich in history and culture, featuring historic buildings and museums. It is an excellent destination for history enthusiasts.

itinerary.day_1: Arrival at Sonargaon, guided tour of Panam City and Sonargaon Museum, explore local markets, departure.

name: Sundarbans
description: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world and home to the Royal Bengal Tiger. It offers an exciting experience for nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts.

itinerary.day_1: Arrival at Khulna, transfer to boat, start cruise into Sundarbans, visit local villages.
itinerary.day_2: Full-day boat safari, visit Kotka Beach and Hiron Point, wildlife watching.
itinerary.day_3: Morning bird watching, return cruise to Khulna, departure.

name: Srimangal
description: Srimangal is known as the 'Tea Capital of Bangladesh' and is famous for its lush green tea gardens, serene environment, and rich biodiversity.

itinerary.day_1: Arrival at Srimangal, check-in at hotel, visit local tea gardens.
itinerary.day_2: Full-day tour to Lawachara National Park, bird watching and hiking.
itinerary.day_3: Visit local market for tea tasting, check-out from hotel, departure.

name: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is the longest natural sea beach in the world, offering stunning views of the Bay of Bengal. It is a popular destination for beach lovers and adventure enthusiasts.

itinerary.day_1: Arrival at Cox's Bazar, check-in at hotel, visit Laboni Beach in the evening.
itinerary.day_2: Full-day tour to Inani Beach and Himchari National Park, enjoy beach activities.
itinerary.day_3: Morning visit to local markets, check-out from hotel, departure.

name: Saint Martin's Island
description: Saint Martin's Island is the only coral island in Bangladesh, known for its crystal-clear waters and vibrant marine life. It is a perfect getaway for snorkeling and beach activities.

itinerary.day_1: Arrival at Saint Martin's Island, check-in at hotel, relax on the beach.
itinerary.day_2: Full-day tour to Chhera Island, snorkeling and beach activities.
itinerary.day_3: Morning leisure, check-out from hotel, departure.

name: Rangamati
description: Rangamati is known for its picturesque landscapes, serene Kaptai Lake, and vibrant tribal culture. It offers a tranquil escape for nature lovers and photographers.

itinerary.day_1: Arrival at Rangamati, check-in at hotel, visit local tribal markets.
itinerary.day_2: Full-day boat tour on Kaptai Lake, visit Hanging Bridge and local villages.
itinerary.day_3: Morning visit to local attractions, check-out from hotel, departure.
